Title: The Wolf
Writer: Tom Clancy (based on characters by), Carlton Cuse (created for television by), Carlton Cuse, Graham Roland (created for television by), Graham Roland
Actors: John Krasinski, Wendell Pierce, Abbie Cornish, Ali Suliman
Plot: As Jack and Cathy grow closer, Jack's double-life is put to the test. A show of force from Suleiman adds to his ranks and brings him one step closer to his next attack.
